attributes.review: First off this app took 9 weeks to download. I donâ€™t even know how that happened. Since I downloaded this app, itâ€™s like a curse has been placed on me. I got Coronavirus 4 separate times, I had to get my leg and six fingers amputated, and the surgeon accidentally left his scalpel in my kidney. Kids make fun of me on Twitter and call me one leg willy and post videos of pop stars in their reply. Are they worsening the hex? Iâ€™ll never get my life back.
